name: The Block (xxdorxx123)
description:
THE BLOCK

The Block is a small Platformer game, regarding the thrilling adventures of The Block. The Block  is a high ranked runner, who is about to participate at the most important race ever. However, at the end of this race, there is a twist in the plot, and things start getting messy.

HOW TO PLAY?

  • Right & left arrows - Move left & right
  • Up arrow - Jump
  • Space - Entry to level
